subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks had a chance for a while against the Heat, but the game disintegrated as Carmelo Anthony proved incapable of sparing them from their fifth loss in six games since the All-Star break.
snippet: The Knicks had a chance for a while against the Heat, but the game disintegrated as Carmelo Anthony proved incapable of sparing them from their fifth loss in six games since the All-Star break.
